title: Aurite Custom Workflow Configuration
description: Configuration schema for custom_workflow components (supports both single objects and arrays)

items.description: Configuration schema for custom_workflow components in Aurite Agents

name.description: The unique name of the component.
name.title: Name

description.description: A brief description of the component.
description.title: Description

module_path.description: Resolved absolute path to the Python file containing the workflow class. Examples: 'mcp_servers/weather_server.py', './scripts/my_server.py', '~/projects/server.py'. Avoid spaces in paths when possible.
module_path.title: Module Path
module_path.patternErrorMessage: Invalid path format. Avoid special characters like |, <, >, &, ;, $, `. Spaces are allowed but not recommended - use underscores or hyphens instead.
module_path.markdownDescription: **File path** - Resolved absolute path to the Python file containing the workflow class. Examples: 'mcp_servers/weather_server.py', './scripts/my_server.py', '~/projects/server.py'. Avoid spaces in paths when possible.

class_name.description: Name of the class within the module that implements the workflow.
class_name.title: Class Name
